title: Prosecutor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may Prosecute a player during the day. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- A Prosecuted player will be put on trial, and their verdict will be guilty.
- If you Prosecute a Town member, you will be hanged by the Town Hangman (die immediately).
- Prosecuting does not count as the daily execution.

desc:
Post 3840
*WE LOVE PROSECUTING THE TRACKER CLAIM FOR NO DAMN REASON*
